name: Necropolis Cemetery Glasgow
description: A historic cemetery in Glasgow known for its stunning architecture and as a filming location.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Necropolis Cemetery** is a Victorian cemetery located in Glasgow, Scotland. It is renowned for its architectural and historical significance, featuring elaborate tombstones and monuments. The cemetery is a haven for local wildlife and a popular spot for tourists and historians alike.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Necropolis Cemetery has been used as a filming location for various productions. Notably, it appeared in the 2022 film *The Batman*, where it doubled as a part of the fictional Gotham City for several atmospheric scenes.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: The cemetery is open to the public year-round, with guided tours available that showcase its history and the notable figures buried there. It is maintained by a local trust and remains a preserved site of cultural significance.
